Text:
I know this looks suspicious, being released before the Saturday airdate...

But it's the real thing.  News article/discussion about it here:
http://www.equestriadaily.com/2012/02/about-leak.html

"Pic or it didn't happen", you say?  I've got pics.  Check the link in the torrent's text file.  (Once again, TPB will NOT let me post a bitDOTly link)
Oh my god, it actually worked.
